name: Quantum Cat-alyst
description: This advanced catalyst weapon is infused with the mysterious power of quantum mechanics, and bears the likeness of a curious cat, with glowing green eyes, a tail that flickers with electro energy, and the occasional spark arcing between the ears.

passiveDescription.0: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>18%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charge Attack DMG by <cryo>6%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. When the wielder triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, they gain <cryo>10</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
passiveDescription.1: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>22.5%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charge Attack DMG by <cryo>7.5%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. When the wielder triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, they gain <cryo>12</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

When the wielder triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, they gain <cryo>14</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
passiveDescription.3: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>31.5%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charge Attack DMG by <cryo>10.5%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. When the wielder triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, they gain <cryo>16</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

When the wielder triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, they gain <cryo>18</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
